meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a puppy.
meanings.sent1: The little girl's puppyish behavior made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The puppyish dog wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent3: The puppyish antics of the kitten entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as puppyish as a joyful pup's bark.
meanings.sent5: The puppyish charm of the baby's giggles was infectious.

meanings.definition: Playful or mischievous in a way that is typical of a puppy.
meanings.sent1: The children's puppyish playfulness brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The puppyish kitten batted at a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent3: His puppyish grin gave away his mischievous plan.
meanings.sent4: The puppyish twinkle in her eye hinted at her playful nature.
meanings.sent5: The puppyish energy of the puppy was contagious.
